Lurker features a few site-specific plugins to increase functionality. Below lists and redirects to documentation of said plugins.

Frequent

  • Simplenavi by Andreas Gohr
  • Gallery by Andreas Gohr
  • Wrap by Anika Henke
  • Imagebox by Lukas Rademacher, FFTiger & myst6re
  • RefNotes by Mykola Ostrovskyy
  • Fontsize2 by Thorsten Stratmann

Syntax

  • color syntax plugin 2016-10-20 by Christopher Smith
    Write colored text in DokuWiki.
  • spoiler plugin 2007-07-19 by Heikki Hokkanen
    Add <spoiler> tag, allowing sections that are initially hidden and can be made visible by clicking on a button. Another click will hide the spoiler again
  • Comment Syntax support 2016-07-20 by Satoshi Sahara
    Allow to use source comment syntax to leave edit instructions of the page. Comments are visible only in the source view, not rendered as any page elements.
  • Gallery Plugin 2017-10-11 by Andreas Gohr
    Creates a gallery of images from a namespace or RSS/ATOM feed
  • a2s plugin 2017-08-05 by Schplurtz le Déboulonné
    Convert ASCII art to nice embeded SVG images.
  • Box Plugin 2016-02-17 by Christopher Smith
    Boxes with titles, colour and rounded corners. Syntax: <box width class colours|title> ... </box|caption> width, class, colours title & caption are optional. The title can include some wiki markup, the box contents can include almost any wiki markup.
  • Wrap Plugin 2015-07-19 by Anika Henke
    Universal plugin which combines functionalities of many other plugins. Wrap wiki text inside containers (divs or spans) and give them a class (choose from a variety of preset classes), a width and/or a language with its associated text direction.
  • discussion plugin 2017-08-24 by Michael Hamann, Gerrit Uitslag, Gina Häussge, Christopher Smith, Michael Klier, Esther Brunner, Matthias Schulte
    Provides discussion funtionality for wiki pages
  • include plugin 2017-08-24 by Michael Hamann, Gina Häussge, Christopher Smith, Michael Klier, Esther Brunner
    Functions to include another page in a wiki page
  • Fields Plugin 2016-09-14 by Aurelien Bompard, LarsDW223
    Store and recall user-defined fields
  • fontsize2 plugin 2017-01-07 by Thorsten Stratmann
    DokuWiki plugin for controlling the size of your text
  • Pagelist Plugin 2017-08-24 by Matthias Schulte, Michael Hamann, Michael Klier, Gina Haeussge
    Lists pages in a nice formatted way
  • Video Sharing Site Plugin 2017-04-27 by Andreas Gohr
    Easily embed videos from various Video Sharing sites. Example: {{youtube>XXXXXX}}
  • Changes Plugin 2017-04-15 by Andreas Gohr
    List the most recent changes of the wiki
  • Info Plugin 2014-10-01 by Andreas Gohr
    Displays information about various DokuWiki internals
  • Icons Plugin 2017-06-09 by Giuseppe Di Terlizzi
    Embed icons in Dokuwiki
  • simplenavi plugin 2016-07-18 by Andreas Gohr
    Create a simple navigation tree based on namespaces
  • folded plugin 2017-05-30 by Michael Hamann, Fabian van-de-l_Isle, Christopher Smith, Esther Brunner
    Foldable page sections
  • hidepages plugin 2013-08-02 by Matthias Schulte
    Hide pages from search results and/or sitemap
  • Plugin imagebox 2016-11-22 by Lukas Rademacher, FFTiger & myst6re
    Syntax for display an image with a caption, like Wikipedia.org
  • DokuWiki statdisplay plugin 2016-08-29 by Andreas Gohr
    Displays log statistics about your DokuWiki
  • RefNotes Plugin 2017-02-28 by Mykola Ostrovskyy
    Extended syntax for footnotes and references.

Renderer

  • prettyphoto plugin 2013-05-29 by Marcus von Appen
    jQuery PrettyPhoto Plugin
  • edittable plugin 2017-09-07 by Andreas Gohr
    Provide a custom editor for tables
